articles.title: ISL 7: Goa beat Hyderabad 2-1 to end year on a high - Times Now
articles.description: Aridane Santana (58') put Hyderabad ahead but Goa left it late and scored through substitute Ishan Pandita (87') and Igor Angulo (90') to inflict a third successive defeat on the Nizams.
